00044 /* Code: */
00045 #include <stdlib.h>
00046 #include <stdio.h>
00047 #include "filter.h"
00048 
00049 unsigned short update_a2d_data (channel_t *channel_struct, unsigned short data) {
00050   long sum = 0;
00051   int i;
00052   channel_struct->raw_result=data;
00053   channel_struct->channel_data[channel_struct->insertion_point++]=data;
00054   if (channel_struct->insertion_point>=FILTER_DEPTH) {
00055     channel_struct->insertion_point=0;
00056   }
00057   for (i=0;i<FILTER_DEPTH;i++) {
00058     sum += channel_struct->channel_data[i];
00059   }
00060   sum /= FILTER_DEPTH;
00061   channel_struct->filtered_result = (unsigned short) sum;
00062   return (channel_struct->filtered_result);
00063 }
00064 
00065 int report_channel_structure(channel_t *channel_struct) {
00066   int i,j;
00067   printf("insertion_point=%d\n",channel_struct->insertion_point);
00068   printf("raw_result=%d\n",channel_struct->raw_result);
00069   printf("filtered_results=%d\n",channel_struct->filtered_result);
00070   for (i=0;i<4;i++) {
00071     for (j=0;j<4;j++) {
00072       printf("%5d ",channel_struct->channel_data[4*i+j]);
00073     }
00074     printf("\n");
00075   }
00076   printf("\n");
00077   return (0);
00078 }
00079 
00080 int initialize_channel_structure(channel_t *channel_struct) {
00081   int i;
00082   channel_struct->insertion_point=0;
00083   for (i=0;i<FILTER_DEPTH;i++) {
00084     channel_struct->channel_data[i]=0;
00085   }
00086   channel_struct->raw_result=0;
00087   channel_struct->filtered_result=0;
00088   return (0);
00089 }
